2.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCalls upon holy energy to inflict !e1 damage.
2.name: Holy_Blast
2.title: Holy Blast

6.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dBurns the target with holy energy that inflicts !e1 damage and engulfs them in a holy fire that inflicts !e2 damage every 2 seconds for 14 seconds.
6.name: Cleansing_Flame
6.title: Cleansing Flame

7.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage.
Cast time is decreased by 100% when a Fanaticism effect is active
7.name: Particle_of_Light
7.title: Particle of Light

9.body: !lvl !cost !dYou learn how to use an Aspect of Light which improves your damaging Holy spells
9.name: Master_of_Aspects
9.title: Master of Aspects

10.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage and knocks down the target and all enemies within an 8 yard radius.
10.name: Heavenly_Smite
10.title: Heavenly Smite

11.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSurrounds you with a holy shield that makes you immune to all damage for !e1 seconds and dispels most of the negative effects.
You cannot use any abilities that require a weapon for the duration of the effect.
11.name: Holy_Shield
11.title: Holy Shield

12.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCreates a bright flash of light that makes the target unable to see for 5 seconds and reduces their movement speed by 50%.
12.name: Blind_Faith
12.title: Blind Faith

13.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHeals a friendly target for !e1 every 2 seconds for 14 seconds.
Mana cost of Perpetual Healing increases by 100% for each subsequent target.
13.name: Perpetual_Healing
13.title: Perpetual Healing

14.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInflicts !e1 damage and jumps up to 4 other enemies in 10 yard radius.
If you are in a state of Fanaticism, this spell is cast instantly.
14.name: Chain_of_Light
14.title: Chain of Light

15.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dWeapon strike inflicting !e1 to !e2 damage.
Does not share cooldown with other abilities.
15.name: Holy_Rage
15.title: Holy Rage

17.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCleanses 1 harmful Poison, Disease, or magical effect from a friendly target.
17.name: Purification
17.title: Purification

18.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dA powerful prayer that heals a friendly target for !e1 If you are in a state of Fanaticism, this spell is cast instantly.
18.name: Holy_Rejuvenation
18.title: Holy Rejuvenation

19.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dDecreases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 50%.
Spells you cast increase magic damage done by your party members by !e1%Cast this spell again to remove this effect
19.name: Aura_of_Astral_Power_
19.title: Aura of Astral Power

20.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dBinds the target with holy energy for !e1 seconds that makes them periodically unable to move or use abilities.
Can only be used on humanoids.
20.name: Binding_Light
20.title: Binding Light

21.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCalls upon holy energy to inflict !e1 damage.
21.name: Celestial_Judgement
21.title: Celestial Judgement

23.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dA powerful prayer that heals a friendly target for !e1 If you are in a state of Fanaticism, this spell is cast instantly.
23.name: Holy_Healing
23.title: Holy Healing

25.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies up to 6 stacks of the Providence effect to a target.
Upon receiving damage, one stack is consumed and a friendly target restores !e1 health, while a hostile target inflicts !e2 Holy damage.
*Consumes 3 Tears of Dragons.*
Using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality increases the number of effect stacks.
25.name: Providence
25.title: Providence

26.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dApplies an effect absorbing !e1 damage to a friendly target.
Duration: 30 seconds.
Upon expiry of the effect all nearby enemies will be knocked down for 2 seconds.
*Consumes 4 Tears of Dragon.*
Damage absorbed is increased if Tears of Dragon of a higher quality are used.
26.name: Faith_Boundaries
26.title: Faith Boundaries

27.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChannels a holy prayer that heals all party members within a 20 yard radius for 44.
6 every 2 seconds.
27.name: Circle_of_Healing
27.title: Circle of Healing

28.body:
!lvl !cost !dWhen your Aspect of Light is active, range of your "Holy Blast", "Celestial Judgement", "Particle of Light" and "Chain of Light" is increased by !e1 yards.
In addition, your "Particle of Light" slows down the enemy target for !e2 seconds if cast from behind.
28.name: Light's_Reach
28.title: Light's Reach

29.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the effects of all Holy spells by !e1%.
29.name: Power_of_the_Pure
29.title: Power of the Pure

30.body: !lvl !cost !dReduces the mana cost of "Holy Blast", "Celestial Judgement", "Devoted Plea" and Restorative Light by !e1%.
30.name: Angelic_Grace
30.title: Angelic Grace

31.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage of your "Holy Blast" and "Celestial Judgement" by !e1% when your Aspect of Light is active.
31.name: Holy_Flame
31.title: Holy Flame

32.body:
!lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown duration of "Holy Shield" by !e1%.
Decreases mana cost and cooldown duration of switching between Aspects by !e2%.
32.name: Deep_Concentration
32.title: Deep Concentration

33.body:
!lvl !cost !dGrants you a 5% chance to enter a state of Frenzy for 20 seconds every time you use your "Holy Blast" or "Celestial Judgement".
Frenzy effect decreases cast time of your "Holy Blast" and "Celestial Judgement" by 100% and their mana cost by 70%, but using these abilities will remove the Frenzy effect at a !e1% chance.
Frenzy effect is guaranteed to last at least 3 seconds.
33.name: Frenzy
33.title: Frenzy

34.body:
!lvl !cost !dReduces the cast time of Heavenly Miracle by !e1%.
Reduces the cast time of "Heavenly Smite", "Celestial Judgement" and "Particle of Light" by !e2%.
34.name: Miracle_Worker
34.title: Miracle Worker

35.body:
!lvl !cost !dCauses your magical resistance and armor to increase by !e1% for 10 seconds after your health drops below 50%.
Can only be activated once every 40 seconds.
35.name: Disciple's_Reward
35.title: Disciple's Reward

37.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage dealt by "Heavenly Smite" and "Chain of Light" by !e1%.
In addition, there is a !e2% chance that casting these spells will not be interrupted by damage.
37.name: Inevitable_Punishment
37.title: Inevitable Punishment

38.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage of "Particle of Light" by !e1%.
38.name: Light's_Generosity
38.title: Light's Generosity

39.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dHeals you for 87.
4 and greatly reduces your threat.
Requires Aspect of Light or Aspect of Mercy.
39.name: Entreaty
39.title: Entreaty

40.body: !lvl !cost !dYour "Holy Blast" and "Celestial Judgement" spell casts increase the chance of entering a state of "Frenzy" by !e1%.
40.name: Unbridled_Wrath
40.title: Unbridled Wrath

41.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Holy Blast" and "Celestial Judgement" critical damage increases by !e1%.
15 second cooldown.
41.name: Blessed_Resolution
41.title: Blessed Resolution

42.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the critical strike chance of "Holy Blast", "Celestial Judgement", "Devoted Plea", and Restorative Light by !e1% of your current critical strike chance.
42.name: Righteous_Fervor
42.title: Righteous Fervor

43.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your Conviction by !e1% and causes "Holy Rage" to reduce the target's movement speed by 50% for !e2 seconds when your Aspect of Rage is active.
43.name: Veracity
43.title: Veracity

44.body: !lvl !cost !dHeals all party members for !e1 each time you gain a Fanaticism effect.
44.name: Brilliant_Faith
44.title: Brilliant Faith

45.body: !lvl !cost !dReduces the cooldown duration of "Binding Light" and "Hold in Contempt" by !e1%.
45.name: Divine_Punishment
45.title: Divine Punishment

46.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases your Endurance by !e1%.
Each time you receive a critical strike, you have a !e2% chance to enter a state of Fanaticism.
46.name: Holy_Avenger
46.title: Holy Avenger

47.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen your Aspect of Rage is active, your physical damage dealt is increased by !e1%.
47.name: Blessed_Steel
47.title: Blessed Steel

48.body: !lvl !cost !dChance to enter a state of Fanaticism is increased by !e1%
48.name: Unbending_Will
48.title: Unbending Will

49.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Verdict" and "Anathema" by !e1% when your target health drops below 30%.
Increases your Lightning damage by !e2%
49.name: Executioner
49.title: Executioner

50.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases your chance to block by !e1% of your current chance to block, and increases your chance to dodge when using a two-handed weapon by !e2% of your current chance to dodge.
Decreases the duration of all movement impairing effects by !e3%.
50.name: Divine_Instincts
50.title: Divine Instincts

51.body: !lvl !cost !dReduces the mana cost and cooldown duration of "Verdict" and "Anathema" by !e1%.
51.name: Power_of_Faith
51.title: Power of Faith

52.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your healing received by !e1% when your health is below 50%.
52.name: Ray_of_Hope
52.title: Ray of Hope

53.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dCauses all demons within a 15 yard radius to flee in terror for 10 seconds.
53.name: Exorcism
53.title: Exorcism

54.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Verdict", "Anathema" and "Holy Rage" inflict !e1 additional Lightning damage at a 12.
5% success rate.
54.name: Execution
54.title: Execution

55.body: !lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dUtters a holy word that prevents the target from casting spells for 6 seconds.
55.name: Hold_in_Contempt
55.title: Hold in Contempt

56.body: !lvl !cost !dIn combat, when your Aspect of Rage is active, you enter a state of Fanaticism every !e1 seconds.
56.name: Punishing_Fanaticism
56.title: Punishing Fanaticism

57.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen an Aspect of Rage is active, your successful "Verdict", "Anathema" and "Holy Rage" spell casts increase Holy damage taken by the target by !e1% for 8 seconds.
57.name: Saintly_Reach
57.title: Saintly Reach

58.body:
!lvl !cost !dDecreases the cooldown of "Holy Rage" by !e1 seconds when you use "Particle of Light" or "Chain of Light".
Decreases mana cost of "Holy Rage" by !e2%.
58.name: Devout_Servant
58.title: Devout Servant

59.body:
!lvl !element !cost !radius !mana !time !cooldawn !preparation !dPlaces an enchantment on a friendly target that heals for 99.
7 when the target's health decreases to 35% or less.
Priest can place only one enchantment at a time.
59.name: Divine_Foresight
59.title: Divine Foresight

60.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases the healing done by your "Holy Rejuvenation" and Faith Cure by !e1%.
Reduces cooldown duration of "Divine Prayer" by !e2%.
60.name: True_Faith
60.title: True Faith

61.body:
!lvl !cost !dEach tick of the "Cleansing Flame" effect gains a !e1% chance to renew the effect to full duration and increase its damage by 10%.
The duration can be renewed up to 5 times.
Increases duration of your "Perpetual Healing" by !e2%
61.name: Eternal_Fire
61.title: Eternal Fire

62.body: !lvl !cost !dReduces the mana cost of "Cleansing Flame" and "Perpetual Healing" by !e1%.
62.name: Holy_Advantage
62.title: Holy Advantage

64.body: !lvl !cost !dGrants "Cleansing Flame" a !e1% chance to increase the damage dealt by the next Holy attack by 40%.
64.name: Blaze_of_Faith
64.title: Blaze of Faith

66.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the critical strike effect of "Cleansing Flame" and "Perpetual Healing" by !e1%.
66.name: Divine_Infusion
66.title: Divine Infusion

67.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the damage you deal to creatures that use mana and the effectiveness of your "Devoted Plea", Restorative Light, "Divine Prayer" and "Holy Rejuvenation" applied to creatures that use energy by !e1%
67.name: Inquisitor
67.title: Inquisitor

68.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases the effects of "Cleansing Flame" and "Perpetual Healing" by !e1%.
68.name: Surge_of_Faith
68.title: Surge of Faith

70.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Divine Prayer" grants immunity to fear, stun and knock down effects for 5 seconds at a !e1% success rate.
In addition, it will dispel fear, stun and knock down effects from the target
70.name: Strengthening_Heal
70.title: Strengthening Heal

71.body:
!lvl !cost !dGrants "Holy Rejuvenation" and Faith Cure a !e1% chance to heal the target for 43.
7 additional health over 10 seconds.
71.name: Sacred_Blessing
71.title: Sacred Blessing

73.body: !lvl !cost !d"Particle of Light" and "Chain of Light" deal !e1% more damage, but they can't be used whitout the "Fanaticism" effect.
73.name: Crusade
73.title: Crusade
